title: Most of the emails I deleted from the notification shade still show in my inbox when opening the app
creator: paul.neatu
content:
Hi, I use Thunderbird for Android Beta 12.0b6 and I have the following problems: 1. Most of the emails I deleted from the notification shade still show in my inbox when opening the app.

2. Since the last update, the gestures work poorly, I have to swipe 2 or 3 times in order to delete an email.

Please have a look into it when you have the time. Thanks

title: email password
creator: eugene.vale
content: Android version. I don't want to save my passwords. I want to enter them every time that I log on. How can I do this? I installed Thunderbird and did not enter passwords, but I cannot find how to enter them, now.

title: No push notifications for Outlook account
creator: exnor
content:
Hi, I have the problem that I don't receive any push notifications for my Outlook account. I tried both the Thunderbird and Thunderbird Beta app and everything ist setup correctly, as I get instant push notifications for my other accounts. What I also noticed is even when I open the app and refresh the Unified Inbox, new emails on my Outlook account don't appear. I have to select the inbox of my Outlook account and refresh that to actually get my new emails.

Does anyone know how to solve this or has a similar problem?
